snippet: The bank’s inflation report said economic output contracted 0.7 percent in the second quarter and growth for the year was likely to hover near zero.
abstract: Bank of England's inflation report says economic output contracted 0.7 percent in the second quarter and growth for 2012 is likely to hover near zero; rules out imminent cut in interest rates.
lead_paragraph: The bank’s inflation report said economic output contracted 0.7 percent in the second quarter and growth for the year was likely to hover near zero.

headline.seo: British Central Bank Cuts Growth Forecast
headline.main: British Central Bank Cuts Growth Forecast
headline.print_headline: British Central Bank Cuts Growth Forecast but Not Interest Rates
